content:
And at last, please take this <color=#8AAB4B>Curated Outfit Pack</color> <size=30>which I couldn't resist and ended up buying way too many</size>!
Thank you for being with me to complete this thrilling mission.
info: 墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献完成_主流程文本2

content: Should we ask Sani to drive us?
info: 墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献完成_主流程文本2

content: From what I've read in the Academia's records, there have been cases before where an entire Bubble World's ecosystem was studied and showcased in a museum.
info: 墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献完成_主流程文本2

content: The Academia's top academic journal has proven that Maelstrom is the dominant factor affecting Bubble Worlds, and their positions don't have a direct correlation.
info: 墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献完成_主流程文本2

content:
We've gathered enough ecological research samples!
I think we now have a solid ecological model of our Bubble World!
info: 墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献完成_主流程文本2

content: I have a friend with a terrible personality. I rarely agree with what he says, but there's one thing I do—
info: 墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献完成_主流程文本2

content:
Shh! If Sani knows, everyone will know!
       <size=30>For now, just keep it quiet from Mr. Mobai and the others. Now, let's get driving!</size>
info: 墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献完成_主流程文本2

content:
All we're doing is bringing the two Bubble Worlds a little closer.
At least, in theory.
info: 墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献完成_主流程文本2

content: "Things will work themselves out in the end!" Once everyone sees it, a solution will come naturally!
info: 墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献完成_主流程文本2

content:
Don't worry!
The link between the two Bubble Worlds
isn't purely physical.
info: 墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献完成_主流程文本2

content: Is this even possible? Then let's go get another one!
info: 墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献完成_主流程文本2

content: At least, in theory.
info: 墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献完成_主流程文本2

content:
With this, we'll be able to set up a systematic
ecological vitality research center! Maybe we can even figure out why the Bubble World isn't affected by Maelstrom.
info: 墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献完成_主流程文本2

content:
If possible,
I'd like to carry this grand vision forward
and name our ecological research center the "<color=#8AAB4B>Omni-Gallery</color>"!
info: 墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献完成_主流程文本2

content:
I must say, that's quite audacious of you!
You have my full support!
info: 墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献完成_主流程文本2
墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献完成_主流程文本2

content: I'm a little worried. Will there be any consequences?
info: 墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献完成_主流程文本2

content: I've taken part in many research projects. While this isn't exactly my area of expertise, I'm confident it'll work out!
info: 墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献完成_主流程文本2

content: In theory?! What if they ask about it...
info: 墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献完成_主流程文本2

content: Hmm... I have a bit of a favor to ask... <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, could I trouble you to come with me to the "little Bubble World" again?
info: 墨尔斯万象馆建馆捐献完成_主流程文本2

content: Thank you so much, <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, for coming with me to bring back the "little Bubble World"!
